html:
July 2 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including BASF SE, BHP and H&M, on Friday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* BASF SE BASFn.DE: JP Morgan raises to neutral from underweight

* BHP BHPB.L: Liberum cuts to sell from hold

* Evonik Industries AG EVKn.DE: Goldman Sachs cuts to sell from buy

* H&M HMb.ST: Goldman Sachs cuts to neutral from buy

* Informa INF.L: Berenberg raises to buy from hold

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Friday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.
